description: Retrieves the list of key-value tags assigned to the application. For more information, see Using Tagging.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The ARN of the application for which to retrieve tags.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The key-value tags assigned to the application.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the key-value tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the key-value tag. The value is optional.
